title: Hagerman Fossil Beds National Monument: Photos & Multimedia
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia       Â      Looking at fossils up close. NPS Photo  When visiting a National Park, the Leave No Trace ethic, "Take only pictures, leave only footprints" holds particularly true; and many visitors, after leaving here with memories and pictures, are eager to share them with friends, family, and the world. Visit us often as we add photos of the Fossil Beds.
